body.name: Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Fresh Scent, 128 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 166.5 Fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 31 mins
features: One 166.5 fl oz bottle of ARM & HAMMER Plus OxiClean Stain Remover Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent cleans 128 medium loads when used as directed
HE detergent that delivers 5 powerful cleaning benefits in 1: it attacks stains, fights odors, whitens whites, brightens colors and delivers a boost of freshness
With trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda plus OxiClean stain fighters, this HE laundry detergent is formulated to deeply clean clothes and deliver lasting freshness
Laundry stain remover forces out stubborn stains and nasty odors using OxiClean Stain Fighters to remove over 101 stains, like food, grass, grease and more
Clean-rinsing, low-sudsing formula won’t block HE machine sensors, making it an effective choice for both standard and HE washers
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Plus OxiClean Liquid Laundry Detergent is ideal in standard and High Efficiency (HE) washing machines. This low-sudsing, clean-rinsing fresh scent detergent delivers 5 powerful cleaning benefits in 1: it attacks stains, fights odors, whitens whites, brightens colors and delivers a boost of freshness. This laundry detergent powers out microscopic stains and dirt to deliver a hygienic clean. Concentrated with 3X powerful stain fighters in every load versus the leading value detergent, this HE detergent is powerful enough to handle your toughest loads in all wash temperatures, even cold water. Supercharged with OxiClean stain fighters to attack over 101 tough stains This HE laundry detergent keeps whites whiter and brights brighter (vs regular ARM & HAMMER). Blended with trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this laundry soap is tough on odors, dirt and stains, leaving clothes clean and fresh. For standard bottles, fill the cap to Bar A for medium-sized loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. Add a full cap of this detergent to large or heavily soiled loads to deeply clean and freshen clothes. For larger dispenser sizes, fill to top of Line C for medium loads. For large or heavily soiled loads, use half a capful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Clean Meadow Liquid Laundry Detergent Arm & Hammer Plus Oxi Clean Fresh Scent 5-in-1 Laundry Detergent Power Paks Arm & Hammer Purifying Meadows In-Wash Scent Booster Arm & Hammer Clean Meadow In-Wash Scent Booster Scent Fresh Scent Clean Meadow Fresh Scent Purifying Waters Clean Meadow For Use In All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures Benefits Powers out microscopic stains and dirt to deliver a hygienic, deep clean with a Fresh Scent Powers out microscopic stains and dirt to deliver a hygienic, deep clean with a Clean Meadow Scent Concentrated laundry detergent in a convenient, pre-measured unit dose form powers out stains and dirt to deliver a hygienic, deep clean. Tiny scent crystals in this in-wash scent booster deliver a fragrance that showcases a sparkling blend of jasmine and lavender petals, all mixed with the refreshing scent of crisp ocean air. Tiny scent crystals in in-wash laundry scent boosters deliver the inviting fragrance of clean florals in a bright green meadow, blended with crisp and refreshing fruit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Cleaning Power and Fresh Scent! - 5 Stars
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance. Here's why I highly recommend it:1. Exceptional Cleaning Power:Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean tackles tough stains like a champion. Even on stubborn stains, this detergent proves its worth, leaving my clothes looking clean and fresh after every wash.2. Economical and Efficient:With 128 loads per bottle, this detergent offers excellent value for money. A little goes a long way, and I find that I need less detergent than with other brands to achieve the same, if not better, results.3. Invigorating Fresh Scent:The fresh scent of this detergent is a game-changer. It leaves my laundry with a clean and invigorating aroma that lasts for days. It's not overpowering, but it adds a pleasant freshness to my clothes.4. Gentle on Fabrics:Despite its powerful cleaning abilities, I appreciate that Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean is gentle on my clothes. I haven't experienced any fading or wear, even after multiple washes.5. Versatile Usage:This detergent is suitable for various fabrics and colors. From whites to bright colors, it maintains the integrity of my clothes while delivering a thorough clean.6. Easy-to-Pour Bottle:The bottle design is user-friendly, allowing for easy pouring without spills. The convenient measuring cap ensures that I use just the right amount for each load.In conclusion, Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent is a winner in my laundry room. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a powerful yet gentle detergent that leaves clothes impeccably clean and smelling fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I read all of the reviews so that you don't have to!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried this laundry detergent too, and combining my experience with customer reviews, here's a balanced perspective:Pros:- Pleasant Scent: Many customers, including myself, love the fragrance. It's described as great, fresh, and subtle.- Effective Cleaning: It effectively removes stains and gets clothes clean, even in cold water and for heavily soiled items.- Value for Money: The product is considered a good value, offering quality cleaning at a reasonable price.- Environmentally Friendly: Works well in greywater systems, making it a suitable choice for eco--conscious households.- Versatility: Effective for a range of laundry items, from delicates to heavy throw rugs. - Odor Removal: It's particularly good at removing unwanted odors from clothes.Cons:- Leakage During Shipping: Some customers, including myself, have experienced issues with the product leaking during delivery.- Fragrance Sensitivity: While the scent is generally well-liked, it may be too strong for those sensitive to fragrances.- Availability: The desired scent can be hard to find in some locations, leading customers to order online despite concerns over potential spillage.Summary:This laundry detergent is a great choice for those seeking effective cleaning with a pleasant scent. Its ability to work in cold water and greywater systems is a plus for both energy efficiency and environmental friendliness. While the fragrance is generally appreciated, it might be overpowering for some. The major drawback seems to be the risk of leakage during shipping, a concern for online purchasers. However, overall, it offers good value for money and reliable cleaning performance, making it a solid choice for routine laundry needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Cleanliness and Freshness at a Remarkable Price
reviews.reviewText: Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Liquid Laundry Detergent, I can confidently say that there's simply no reason to spend more on laundry detergent. This product not only cleans my clothes effectively in cold water, but it also leaves them with a delightful, fresh scent.Every time I open the dryer and catch a whiff of my freshly cleaned clothes, it's an instant mood lifter. My sheets at night are an absolute delight to snuggle into – they smell and feel exceptionally clean and fresh.Even if this detergent weren't one of the most cost-effective options on the market, I'd still love it just the same. The fact that it offers such outstanding cleaning power and leaves my laundry smelling so pleasant is already a win. The affordability is simply an added benefit.In terms of performance, I find it surpasses some of the more expensive brands like Tide or Gain, both in terms of cleanliness and scent. It consistently delivers clean, fresh, and great-smelling laundry, load after load.In summary, I highly recommend giving Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Liquid Laundry Detergent a try. Whether you're looking for a budget-friendly option or just want your laundry to come out exceptionally clean and smelling fantastic, this detergent is a top-notch choice that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What's not too like? Cleans well, smells good and a very affordable price. As long as price stays as is I will definitely keep buying this and I'm picky about laundry detergent. I love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great scent. Nice and soft. Great quality and quantity for price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice clean scent, washes and rinses well
reviews.reviewText: Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Fresh Scent is a clean scented detergent that both cleans well and rinses well. This is a great value too. I used this for both regular laundry and for pretreating. I would recommend this product for the value and for the performance as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best detergent in our planet
reviews.reviewText: This is the best laundry detergent that I have used thus far!! I have gone through several different brands. It’s gets the clothes very clean, and the smell is amazing. With last detergents, I always found myself using a lot of detergent bc the clothes would still be coming out with stains and odor. Then I started issuing multiple things in my laundry just to make it smell better. The scent booster beads, fabrics softener, etc. With Arm&Hammer I don’t have to use any of that. Just the detergent and a small amount of at that and the clothes come out exceptionally clean every time. My machine is already 7 years its good for the machine
